name: Phantom Pain
description: Evidence suggests the temporal anomalies are causing the frequent disruptions to the Collective. The Borg seek the Federation's aid in solving the problem, but factions offering assistance may prove to be more trouble than their efforts are worth.
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Icheb, Arjin, J. Dax, Astrophysicists, or 'Picard and Number One' will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Icheb, Arjin, J. Dax, Picard and Number One or Astrophysicists
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: J. Dax
featured_crew.flavor: Honoring an oath made by Curzon, Jadzia avenged the sons of Kang, Koloth, and Kor.

adventures.name: How Far We've Come
adventures.description: Gather records of the UFP's past deeds to convince the Borg.

adventures.description: Prototype upgrades to the Collective's security.

adventures.name: Bits and Pieces
adventures.description: Evaluate the stability of current Borg implants.

adventures.name: Separate Whole
adventures.description: Create a partition to protect the Collective.

goals.flavor: Craft inroads into the Collective with the Cardassians.
Assess the anomalies' effects with the Augments.

screens.text: "It looks like our efforts to track the cube carrying Cadet Picard have turned up something else of interest. The temporal anomalies seem to be disrupting the Borg's ability to control cubes beyond a certain distance."
"The Borg are displeased. They have already begun pulling their people back to the Delta Quadrant until they can find a solution."
"Nothing would please me more than to see them leave the Quadrant. The less of them here in the Alpha Quadrant, the better."

"I get that your feelings for the Borg aren't exactly fuzzy. I'm not a fan either. But if we chase them off, our chances of finding Cadet Picard drop to zero. We need them. And who knows what will happen if they're left to brood in the Delta Quadrant. We need to maintain trust."

"It looks like our efforts to track the cube carrying Cadet Picard have turned up something else of interest. The temporal anomalies seem to be disrupting the Borg's ability to control cubes beyond a certain distance."
"The Borg are displeased. They have already begun pulling their people back to the Delta Quadrant until they can find a solution."
"Nothing would please me more than to see them leave the Quadrant. The less of them here in the Alpha Quadrant, the better."

"I get that your feelings for the Borg aren't exactly fuzzy. I'm not a fan either. But if we chase them off, our chances of finding Cadet Picard drop to zero. We need them. And who knows what will happen if they're left to brood in the Delta Quadrant. We need to maintain trust."

"It looks like our efforts to track the cube carrying Cadet Picard have turned up something else of interest. The temporal anomalies seem to be disrupting the Borg's ability to control cubes beyond a certain distance."
"The Borg are displeased. They have already begun pulling their people back to the Delta Quadrant until they can find a solution."
"Nothing would please me more than to see them leave the Quadrant. The less of them here in the Alpha Quadrant, the better."

"I get that your feelings for the Borg aren't exactly fuzzy. I'm not a fan either. But if we chase them off, our chances of finding Cadet Picard drop to zero. We need them. And who knows what will happen if they're left to brood in the Delta Quadrant. We need to maintain trust."
